subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The overall leader, Michael Matthews, claimed his first individual victory on the sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia, which included a crash that left Giampaolo Caruso seriously injured.
snippet: The overall leader, Michael Matthews, claimed his first individual victory on the sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia, which included a crash that left Giampaolo Caruso seriously injured.
